entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
